articles.title: Deep vein thrombosis: What causes blood clots in legs and can it turn deadly? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Deep vein thrombosis is a condition in which a blood clot forms in deep vein, typically in the legs. Here are symptoms and prevention tips. | Health
